title: Files Scanned
body:
Hello Riot my client wont install the new patch im waiting for like 3 hours and my clinet scannes over 100000 Files and nothing happens pls help me and fix this :)

Niklasoss.-

replies.body:
Greetings.

Can you please upload the latest "LoLPatcher.log" from C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs, while you are stuck?

Thanks!

As long as it keeps increasing, its working tho :)
(there are around 40.000 files currently iirc)

btw, this is the german board :-p
My game is on german xDD thats why i here xDD

> [{quoted}](name=Niklasoss,realm=EUW,application-id=7hciEY9w,discussion-id=vMYTipqG,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-04T14:32:11.257+0000)
>
> so i must wating? -.-

as long as its scanning files, it probably does work yeah. But you can upload the latest log i asked for, so i could take a look
